scripts.wire-dep: npm --prefix client i && npm --prefix client i babel-core@^7.0.0-bridge.0
scripts.build: npm run wire-dep && npm run prod
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run build && npm run deploy
scripts.test-frontend: if [ -f ./client/package.json ]; then npm --prefix client run test-once; fi

hooks.pre-commit: npm run test-frontend && bundle exec rspec
